message: I propose dividing the $10,000 with a 70/30 split in favor of you, Bob. I believe this is a fair offer considering the potential risk of inflation.
I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share, but I think 60/40 is a fairer split considering the risk of inflation. Take it or leave it!
Considering the inflation risk, I propose a 60/40 split in favor of Bob. This should reflect the increased value of your portion compared to the previous rounds.
